item.title: How to create a watchdog in Python to look for filesystem changes
item.description: Hey guys, today’s post is about how to create a watchdog in Python. But what is a “watchdog”? A watchdog is a little piece of software that monitors our filesystem looking for any changes (like the creation, change or deletion of a file or of a directory). When a change occurs, the watchdog report it to us raising a specific event that we can handle. For example, let’s suppose you have developed a program that use a configuration file.
